General.Name: Solusi Sinergi Digital Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Solusi Sinergi Digital Tbk engages in the advertising businesses in Indonesia. The company provides digital out-of-home and digital advertising services. It is also involved in trading coffee, tea, and cocoa; and leasing machinery, equipment, and other tangible goods. In addition, the company provides connectivity solutions, such as Dark fibre and bandwidth; and colocation data center, content delivery network, tower fiberization, and IP transit services. Further, it offers digital ecosystems, including mobile applications, such as KAI access and DAMRI for ticketing services, Adakita, and Sobat Tani; and IT solutions. Additionally, the company operates its business in wholesale and retail trade; professional, scientific, and technical activities; leasing and leasing activities without option rights, employment, travel agents and other business support; financial and insurance activities; information and communication; and construction industry. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Solusi Sinergi Digital Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Investasi Sukses Bersama.
General.Address: Kantor Fatmawati Mas Blok III No.328-329, Jakarta, Indonesia, 12430
